attributes.action: Create an Animal offenders list for wild or domestic animals
attributes.background: People who offend animals wild or domestic must be added to an offenders list prosecuted and necessary punishment dealt with!

rejection.details:
It’s not clear what the petition is asking the UK Government or Parliament to do.

Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

It's already possible to be banned from keeping animals and to receive a prison sentence for animal abuse. You can find out more here: https://www.sentencingcouncil.org.uk/offences/item/animal-cruelty-revised-2017/

We're therefore not sure what further action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
